row.column: Here or lower, the character can only be a Magic-User.
Minimum strength for a Gnome, Half-Orc or Halfling character.
Minimum strength for a Dwarf character.
Minimum strength for a Fighter character.
Minimum strength for an Assassin or Paladin character.
Minimum strength for a Ranger character.
Maximum strength possible for a female Halfling character.
Maximum strength possible for a female Gnome character. Minimum strength for a Monk character.
Maximum strength possible for a female Elf character.
Maximum strength possible for a female Dwarf or female Half-Elf or male Halfling character.
Maximum strength possible for all non-Fighter characters.
Maximum strength possible for all female Human or male Gnome characters.
Maximum strength possible for a male Elf or female Half-Orc character.
Maximum strength possible for a male Half-Elf character.
Maximum strength possible for a male Dwarf or male Half-Orc character.
